sentences.en: At last, the paper sets a new model for the suburbanization of China the 1990 s.
sentences.cn: 最后, 尝试构建1990年代中国城市郊区化发展模型.

sentences.en: Like many of New York’s mass suburbanization efforts, such creatures are better in theory than in practice.
sentences.cn: 如同纽约大规模郊区化的众多尝试一样，这些生物最好还是呆在字面上，不要跑出来吓人。
爱丁堡的城市郊区化问题研究 ( 1767-1890 )

sentences.en: Suburbanization and counter - urbanization are two concepts of similarities as well as differences.
sentences.cn: 郊区化与逆城市化是既有联系又有区别的两个概念,逆城市化是郊区化的升级版本.

sentences.en: The low - density office buildings come from the tendency of suburbanization and ecological theory.
sentences.cn: 低密度 办公建筑的出现源于办公的生态主义倾向与郊区化倾向.

sentences.en: Thus the increase in childhood obesity is probably due mainly to the suburbanization of America and the associated decrease in the opportunities children have for exercise.
sentences.cn: 因此儿童肥胖症的增加可能主要是由于美国城市郊区化以及相应的儿童锻炼机会的减少造成的。

sentences.en: With the development of suburbanization, the problem will become increasingly evident.
sentences.cn: 随着郊区化的发展，这个问题将变得日益明显。
